description:
From interface essentials to expressive visuals, Dynamic Icons brings powerful, flexible icon rendering to your Bubble projects. Now supporting both Lucide Icons and Google Material Icons(Symbols) â€“ 1550+ and 3600+ icons respectively â€“ this plugin gives you complete control over icon content, style, and interaction â€“ even dynamically at runtime.

Dynamically define icon using dynamic expressions. Seamlessly change icons in real time based on workflows, data, or user behavior â€“ no page reloads or complex workarounds.

ğŸ¨ Customize size, color, stroke, weight, and positioning
